评论概述: Loved until it fell apart after 2 light wears
评论详情: I really liked this piece & think it’s flattering in the black for something so form fitting. Unfortunately after wearing it twice around my house, the stitching in the inner thigh area came undone. I am 5’0” and the bunching of the legs at the ankles isn’t too much fabric. I’m also small chested & the top is very fitted for me. I will also say the ribbed texture looks nice but after wearing it for a day, I find it makes me itchy. If you don’t have this issue with other ribbed, fitted fabrics then it may not be an issue for you. In short, I’d keep this as a priced piece and likely buy more if they wouldn’t have torn after light use. Disappointed for sure!
May be getting more soon 😎

评论概述: Medium is a one size fits all apparently

This material is so thick and warm, the fabric is stretchy, the straps are adjustable! My only complaint is that there aren’t any pockets. You will NOT regret buying this!

评论概述: Great for working out and running + errands !
评论详情: I loved this jumpsuit sooooo much. I got a size medium (I'm about 160-170 lbs, 5'4, lots of curves) so I got a size medium. It has the perfect amount of stretch and was very easy to slide on. Once it's on, it fits like a glove. The material is smooth and silky, and although its ribbed, it doesn't look cheap at all. The fabric is the perfect thickness, it his my panty lines well and cinched me in all the right places. I didn't wear any bra with this which I absolutely loved. I only had to adjust the straps and this jumpsuit held my girls (38D) in place and they looked great ! I did a 2.5 mile outdoor run, and the fabric kept me dry and cool ! The moisture wicking material surprised me the most. I then had to run a few errands, and it dried almost immediately. I'll probably buy this in a couple more colors. If you're on the fence, just grab it !

I got a size medium, im 5’5 and about 148 pounds and its true to size. Love how this makes me feel in my body. It Accentuates your curves and is comfortable.
